metadata.name: Friends Of Layer #1/50
metadata.description:
Layer is enabling the creative community to succeed in the web3 spectrum. 

This NFT is a commemorative piece to all the handpicked guests, the Friends Of Layer, the will help us to move forward, shaping our product and vision to launch the best tools that our community ever wanted.

To the owners is granted early access to the product, participation in our private contributors channels on Discord and soon, getting access to events, partner NFT projects and many other cool stuff weâ€™re planning to do.

Thank you so much for you contribution!
